data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huchet, Jean-Bernard, Costa-Silva, Vinicius Da (2018): A new species of Polynoncus Burmeister, 1876 from Brazil (Coleoptera: Trogidae). Zootaxa 4524 (5): 553-566, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.5.3|258 occurrences
